title: Rune Page Sale
body: Last rune page sale was 6 months ago. When is the next one expected? Been saving IP in hopes that they'll do the 2 for 1 bundle again.

replies.body: It wasn't 6 months ago. They had one in January (season kick-off sale) and one in May (mid-season invitational) which was only 2 months ago. So you can be sure there will be nothing within the next 2 months. The average seems to be 2 sales per year.
Another 20 rune slots would be good..
I really want one, I have like 3 6300 ip buys on my wishlist (including runepage) so a sale would be great!
